Text:
Proper DVDRip and a fast download...
A/9  (Has English subtitles)
V/8  (Played in 4:3 format)
Plot: A young girl with high ideals about romance is assigned to accompany the spoiled son of the president as he goes on an immersion trip. Coming from different worlds, the two find much to fight about. But an attraction soon grows between them.
Many Thanx to sceneline and CoWRY for the Great rip and Thanx to all the seeders for a quick download...:)
